Title: The Tale of Two Wolves
Writer: Julie Plec (created by), Carina Adly MacKenzie, Julie Plec, Kyle Arrington (executive story editor), Beau DeMayo (executive story editor), K.C. Perry (story editor), L.J. Smith (based in part on the character Klaus from "The Vampire Diaries" novels by)
Actors: Joseph Morgan, Daniel Gillies, Phoebe Tonkin, Charles Michael Davis
Plot: With Hope facing a life-threatening affliction and deteriorating quickly, Klaus travels to Mystic Falls to seek help from Caroline. Tasked with keeping Hope preoccupied in Mystic Falls, ...
